titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Community Gardening Awareness Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary: 7/25/2014--Introduced. Supports the goals and ideals of National Community Gardening Awareness Month, including raising awareness about the importance of community gardens and urban agriculture; improving access to public land for the creation of sustainable food projects; encouraging growth of community gardens; and supporting cooperative efforts among federal, state, local governments, and nonprofit organizations to promote the development and expansion of community gardens.
